p: The same methods of extraction and determination of the total content of glucans, α-glucans, and β-glucans used in our study was also used by other authors [ 3, 30, 43, 44]. The tested 21 commercial and wild grown mushrooms showed results that are in accordance with the studies of Sari et al. [ 30] and McCleary and Draga [ 14], who also studied several mushrooms species with the Megazyme assay kit.
